sense.gloss: irresistible, tremendous, out of this world
cannot help (doing), cannot but do, anxious to do, cannot get enough of

sdata.j: うちの↑息子↑↓むすこ↓ね、ナメクジが↑大好↑↓だいす↓きなの。↑彼↑↓かれ↓↑曰↑↓いわ↓く、ナメクジのねばねば、ぬるぬるが|↑堪↑↓たま↓らない|んだって。
sdata.e: My son really likes slugs. He says they're sticky and slippery, and he finds that fascinating.
